summary: Experienced in monitoring, maintenance, construction, design–dimensioning, and legislation with a demonstrated history of working in the renewable energy industry. Skilled in O&M services for PV plants, EPC project management for PV plants, AutoCAD, and Microsoft Office applications. Obtained a BSc in Electrical engineering and currently sitting for an MBA in Bussiness Management.

projects.title: Poseidon Team
projects.description: The purpose of this project was to achieve the maximum energy efficiency in a prototype electric vehicle. The design, fabrication, and testing was made from students of Piraeus University of Applied Sciences. We competed against teams from all over Europe on Shell Eco Marathon 2017 and we placed 9th with 412 km/kWh. We also won the off-track ''Prototype Vehicle Design'' award
